channel.title: Video & Mobile Marketing on
channel.description: Recent content in Video & Mobile Marketing on

item.title: How To Gain More Customers With Video Marketing
item.description: In recent years, we can see the emergence of many websites on the Internet and even more intense competition between these sites. Everyone is trying to make their website better and more attractive than the competitor's, but still, everyone uses the same methods and tools to promote their business. But many people forget about another very effective method, like video marketing, in which video is the main tool for promoting a business.

item.title: YouTube Marketing 2021: Strategies and Growth
item.description: When you take this course, we will start you from an idea that you want to do YouTube video marketing and we will end with you crafting a professional YouTube channel as well as a strategy for how you will use it.  Boomy and Lara are both internet marketing professionals committed to helping guide you with videos demonstrating the best and the worst in YouTube. We wanted this to be a course that you could watch while you work on your own channel, so it may take longer then the hour of video content.
